code: import React from"react";import{VStack,Heading,Text,Box,Avatar,SimpleGrid}from"@chakra-ui/react";import FullScreenSection from"./FullScreenSection";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const hackathons=[{title:"DSTA BrainHack 2025 (Semi-finalist)",description:"ASR, CV, OCR, RL."}];const HackathonSection=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(FullScreenSection,{justifyContent:"center",alignItems:"center",isDarkBackground:true,backgroundColor:"#121212",w:"100vw",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{height:["15vh","0vh","0vh"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(VStack,{zIndex:1,spacing:[4,6,8],align:"center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{as:"h1",color:"#DAA520",children:"Hackathons & Competitions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontSize:["sm","md","lg"],color:"#D3D3D3",maxW:"80%",textAlign:"center",children:"A list of hackathons and competition that I have participated in"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SimpleGrid,{columns:[1,1,2],spacing:8,maxW:"80%",pt:6,children:hackathons.map((hackathon,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{p:5,borderRadius:"md",background:"#1E1E1E",boxShadow:"md",color:"white",minW:"400px",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{size:"md",mb:2,color:"#DAA520",children:hackathon.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontSize:"sm",color:"#CCCCCC",children:hackathon.description})]},index))})]})]});};export default HackathonSection;
